Sharpened Weapons.name: Sharpened Weapons
Sharpened Weapons.desc: Affected melee allies have +{}% base attack power.

Range Null Field.name: Range Null Field
Range Null Field.desc: Affected enemy units are unable to use range attacks.

Luck.name: Luck
Luck.desc: Allies within range gain maximum luck.

Arrows Wingshield.name: Arrows Wingshield
Arrows Wingshield.desc: Allies in range receive a +{}% defense bonus against ranged attacks.

Absorb Penalties.name: Absorb Penalties
Absorb Penalties.desc: {}% chance to absorb any debuff applied to an ally within range and apply it to themselves instead.

Wolf Trail.name: Wolf Trail
Wolf Trail.desc: Allies within range gain {} additional moving distance.

Pegasus Might.name: Pegasus Might
Pegasus Might.desc: Allies within range gain +{} base attack and armor.

War Anger.name: War Anger
War Anger.desc: Standing within range on hit grants {}% of additional attack damage to the enemy owner.

Tie up the Horses.name: Tie up the Horses
Tie up the Horses.desc: Allied non flying units within the aura's range gain +{} movement distance.
